title: @Meddler @Riot Who is Camille Gameplay designer ?
body:
It might too early, but it would be great to know who is the gameplay designer behind Camille.

Knowing about main Art/Story leads would be cool too, they tend to have their style :D

_GypsyLordFan_

_ZenonTheHardChampMania_ (It's a good thing but I noticed that :p)

For those that don't know yet : http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/camille-comic

replies.body:
The team that worked on Camille is the same champion team that previously worked on Taliyah, Illaoi and Ekko. Some of the people have changed over time though of course.

In terms of gameplay design specifically that was primarily done by Riot Jag. He's a designer who used to be on the Live Gameplay team who's now on new champions.
